about_the_game:
This DLC pack includes the following items:
  • Playable Characters
    True Asuka, Crimson Homura, Ice Queen Yumi, Abyssal Miyabi
  • Hairstyles
    True Asuka, Crimson Homura, Ice Queen Yumi, Abyssal Miyabi
  • Badges
    True Asuka, Crimson Homura, Ice Queen Yumi, Abyssal Miyabi
  • Wooden Dolls
    True Asuka, Crimson Homura, Ice Queen Yumi, Abyssal Miyabi
  • Flags
    True Asuka, Crimson Homura, Ice Queen Yumi, Abyssal Miyabi
  • Fans
    True Asuka, Crimson Homura, Ice Queen Yumi, Abyssal Miyabi
